item.title: Brussels Sprouts with Cranberries and Pecans
item.description: Note: Recommend steaming the brussel sprouts before browning in the pan. This drastically cuts down on required cooking time. Note: I typically combine all of the ingredients in the pan rather than a separate bowl to melt the cheese. Ingredients 1 pound brussels sprouts, de-stemed and halved 1/2 cup dried cranberries 1/3 cup gorgonzola cheese, crumbled 1/3 cup pecans 1/2 cup barley (Optional) 1 tablespoon maple syrup 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar 2 tablespoons olive oil Salt & pepper Directions Prepare barley according to package instructions.
